HTML Interface
============

The Core Html Components all inherit from :py:class:`epyk.core.html.Html`, they're the base for every objects you see on your html page.

The core Html Components are divided into three categories:

.. toctree::
    :maxdepth: 1
    
    /report/html_components/components
    /report/html_components/tables
    /report/html_components/graphs


.. currentmodule:: epyk.core.html
